alert.note: Alert for Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 2:23AM CDT until July 19 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Ward County in north central North Dakota... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Des Lacs, or 14 miles west of Minot, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Burlington around 230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Minot and Surrey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
